title: Strategy and Policy Panel Discussion
description: Strategy and Policy Panel at RSE Asia Australia Unconference 2022.

title: Shaping the Landscape: The Emerging Research Software Engineering Community in Asia
description: Lightning talk presented alongside a poster session at RSECon23, Swansea University during 5-7 September 2023.

title: Navigating the Research Software Engineering Community Landscape in Asia
description: Talk presented at the 56th meeting of the Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN56) during 21-25 August 2023 at Colombo, Sri Lanka.

title: Making research software reproducible and sustainable
description: Talk presented at the FAB23 Conference at the Jigme Namgyel Wangchuck Super FabLab, Thimphu, Bhutan (July 16-28, 2023).

title: Research Software Engineering (RSE) Asia Association: Journey and Future Plans
description: Talk presented at the 55th meeting of the Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN55) during the “Open and Sharing Data Working Group (OSDWG): Asia Pacific Open-Sharing Data and National Research and Education Network (NREN) Open Science” session in Kathmandu, Nepal.

title: Strategy and Policy Panel Discussion
description: Strategy and Policy Panel at RSE Asia Australia Unconference 2022.

title: RSE Asia Association: A year in making
description: Poster presentation and lightning talk on "RSE Asia Association: A year in making" presented at RSECon 2022.

title: Experience Talk: Community Building using Open Science Principles
description: Experience Talk on "Community Building using Open Science Principles" presented at JuliaCon 2022. It was an online conference.

title: Graduation event: Open Life Science Programme Cohort-5 (OLS-5)
description: Graduation from OLS-5 for the project of "Building Pathways for Onboarding to Research Software Engineering (RSE) Asia Association and Adoption of Code of Conduct".

title: Workshop on 'Vive la différence - research software engineers'
description: Talk on "Early career research viewpoint on future vision for DEI in RSE" presented at the Lorentz Centre (hybrid) Workshop on "Vive la différence - research software engineers" organized by the "Research Software Alliance". It was an hybrid event with an in-person element from 19-22 April 2022 at the Lorentz Centre in the Netherlands; and online events from March-April 2022 across different time zones.

title: Lightning Talk at CW22
description: Lightning talk on "RSE Asia Association: In making" at the Software Sustainability Institute's Collaborations Workshop 2022.

title: Workshop session at APAN53
description: Presented the narratives from RSE Asia at Workshop session on “Growing research software initiatives and communities in the Asia Pacific” organized by the Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN53) conference (7th-11th March 2022).

title: Panel discussion at APAN53
description: Presented the developments of the RSE Asia Association in a panel discussion on “Accelerating the paradigm shift towards Open Science and Data Sharing in Pandemic times and beyond” at the Asia Pacific Advanced Network (APAN53) conference, during 7th-11th March 2022.
